vialab.SMT

Class TabZone

  • java.lang.Object
    • vialab.SMT.PGraphicsDelegate
      • vialab.SMT.Zone
        • vialab.SMT.TabZone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener, processing.core.PConstants

    public class TabZone
extends Zone
    TabZone is a container for other Zones, it has tabs along its top, allowing easy switching between different views. Optionally has close buttons on tabs. Currently, each zone added to TabZone becomes its own Tab, and so to have multiple Zones, use another zone as a container (no draw/touch etc method, but has children) and add that zone to TabZone.
